roleset.name: give an award

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: He criticized the award of compensation to the defendant.

example.name: Args 1 & 3
example.text: The National Academy of Engineering gives two inventors of thesemiconductor microchip a $ 350,000 achievement award

example.name: Args 0 &
example.text: The Islamic Center of Northeast Florida has increased their reward for catching the suspect who set off a pipe bomb outside their mosque.
example.arg: for catching the suspect who set off a pipe bomb outside their mosque.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry award.01, OntoNotes grouping award-n sense 1; maps to VN class future_having-13.3. Framed by Claire.
